sentences.en: ...a tumbler with about an inch of whiskey in it.
sentences.cn: …一个装了大约一英寸高的威士忌酒的大玻璃杯。

sentences.en: " Take whiskey, George,'said Taintor. " You ought to know that. "
sentences.cn: “ 喝点威士忌, 乔治, "泰恩特说, " 你该很在行的.

sentences.en: A great deal of whiskey is made in Scotland.
sentences.cn: 很多威士忌酒在苏格兰酿造.

sentences.en: Alexander had drunk too much whiskey.
sentences.cn: 亚历山大喝了过量的威士忌酒.

sentences.en: Hagen held out his china cup fox more whiskey.
sentences.cn: 黑根把那个大瓷杯端起来,再要些威士忌.

sentences.en: He asked for ice for his whiskey and proceeded to get contentedly drunk.
sentences.cn: 他要求在威士忌里加冰，接着心满意足地喝了个酩酊大醉。

sentences.en: He asked for ice for his whiskey and proceeded to get drunk.
sentences.cn: 他要求给他的威士忌里面加冰，接着喝得大醉。

sentences.en: He drank his whiskey almost bottoms up.
sentences.cn: 他把杯中的威士忌喝得几乎一滴不剩.

sentences.en: He was drinking his double whiskey too fast and scowling.
sentences.cn: 他猛灌着双份威士忌，脸色阴沉。

sentences.en: Her voice was raspy with nicotine and whiskey.
sentences.cn: 她因为抽烟喝酒声音变得嘶哑。

sentences.en: Lead cups were used to drink ale or whiskey .
sentences.cn: 铅制的杯子用来喝麦芽酒或威士忌。

sentences.en: Sonny lit a cigar and took a shot of whiskey.
sentences.cn: 桑儿点着了一支雪前烟,又猛喝了一大口威士忌.

sentences.en: The firm in question was Alsbery & Co. , whiskey brokers.
sentences.cn: 那家公司叫阿尔斯伯里公司, 经销威士忌.

sentences.en: We went for the bottle of whiskey that we had stashed behind the bookcase.
sentences.cn: 我们去拿那瓶藏在书架后面的威士忌。

trans.tran_en: Whiskey is a strong alcoholic drink made, especially in the United States and Ireland, from grain such as barley or rye
